KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Boolean compareGT 009
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareNE compareGE compareLT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compareGT function to determine whether the first object has a greater value than the second object. The compareGT function returns the Boolean value, true or false.

Syntax.Note: The Boolean value false has a state value of 1.
The result from the &#62 operation is also the value 1.
